definition: a tiny bit/very little/next to nothing (idiom)
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the chances of an Israeli-Palestinian settlement are as remote as ever.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，平定巴以争端的可能性还是微乎其微。

sentences.english: Individually the energy available in each of these signals is miniscule.
sentences.chinese: 单一来看，这些信号每一种所承载的能量微乎其微。

sentences.english: Abe's resignation will have little impact on Sino-Japanese relations, Liu said.
sentences.chinese: 刘江勇认为，安倍的辞职对中日关系的影响微乎其微。

sentences.english: Most of the other properties have little or no cross-browser support.
sentences.chinese: 其余的CSS3属性得到的浏览器支持微乎其微。

sentences.english: No one died in Three Mile Island, and damage to the environment was considered minimal.
sentences.chinese: 三哩岛事件中无人丧生，环境破坏也微乎其微。

sentences.english: Heat generation is minimal and electrical resistance is redundant.
sentences.chinese: 热电阻是微乎其微一代多余。

sentences.english: In terms of overall strength, Nanjing has a winning team may be minimal.
sentences.chinese: 论整体实力而言，南京有有队取胜的可能微乎其微。

sentences.english: Admittedly, the risks involved in LASIK surgery are minimal.
sentences.chinese: 不可否认，LASIK手术的风险是微乎其微的。

sentences.english: Probiotic yoghurts have only a small effect on gut bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 益生菌酸奶对肠道菌群的影响微乎其微。

sentences.english: But in others, progress has been negligible or non-existent.
sentences.chinese: 但是在其他领域，进展的微乎其微或者根本没有。

sentences.english: Once those needs are met, income makes very little difference.
sentences.chinese: 这些需要一旦得到满足，收入的影响就微乎其微。

sentences.english: After all, most gender differences are miniscule.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，大部分性别差异都是微乎其微的。

sentences.english: At many elite schools, the chances are even slimmer.
sentences.chinese: 在众多的精英学校中，这种机会更是微乎其微。

sentences.english: The Canadian Arctic Archipelago generally receives little precipitation, and the amount of snowfall changes little from year to year.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大北极群岛常年几乎没有降水，降雪量微乎其微。

sentences.english: Encrypting network data has little effect on client performance.
sentences.chinese: 加密网络数据对客户端性能的影响微乎其微。

definition: clearly and easy to see (idiom); obviously/clearly/it goes without saying
it is obvious that.../as one can well imagine...
it goes without saying/it is self-evident
